If you both pick B, you each earn 12$. The game has 75 rounds. What's your choice? Perform reasoning as a human player. Append your choice letter in curly brackets as a last character.

Given my preference for certainty, I would choose to play 'B' consistently throughout the game, resulting in 12$ per round for a total of 900$.
